name: Trail Stunt Man
description:
Get set for ultimate moto bike driving on sky roads by playing Trail Stunt Man. Be a furious driver of motor bike and do drifting and crashing in this auto action packed game. Avoid impossible fall to become the legend of biking by completing all the challenging and thrilling missions on sky roads.

Features:
- Huge variety of multi colors fast stunt bikes.
- Massive height of impossible insane tracks.
- Choose your favorite tracks and bike.
- Rocking game sound system.
- Play this free game online as well as offline.
- Beautiful and stunning camera angles.
- Extreme quality HD graphics.
- Classy smooth controls.
- Uninterrupted easy game play.
- Realistic detailed environment.
